content.description: Sustained slab climbing. Probably the best Sport route on the wall.
content.location: Left side of the wall, sesond (right) set of bolts starting from the ledge above Pigs in Zen.

content.description: Another wonderful climb, Seven Seconds feels a little bit milder than Loopholes, overall.  Like Loopholes, P1 takes better gear, thinning out into well-protected slab on P2.
content.protection: Gear to 2", 6 bolts, bolted anchors above both pitches.  60 meter rope
content.location: The next bolted line right of Loopholes.  Looking up trail from Loopholes base, p2 of Seven Seconds ascends the face to the right of the next left-facing corner.  Look below and slightly right of the anchor at the base of this corner to find the climb's first bolt near the top of a short (30'?) face.  There is a small snag on the ledge above and right of this bolt.

content.description: Restitution's left variation may once have been a fun line up juggy crack, with slabby feet for spice. Today, however, best bring your gardening gloves...
content.protection: Gear to 3". 60 m rope. Bolted rap station.
content.location: Follows the leftward-leaning crack from the base of the Reclamation dihedral, to the anchor above Steady Diet of Nothing.

content.description: Average climbing up an exciting-looking corner. Not particularly jam-friendly, and gear takes some creativity. Don't set your expectations too high...
content.protection: Gear to 2 or 3", 60m rope, bolt anchors
content.location: Route begins near a tree, to the right of the long ledge dividing Pigs in Zen from Idiots Rule. Follows the first major left-facing corner from the left, from the ground to bolts near the top of the feature.

content.description: Easy to protect hand crack leading up to a thin slabby face with 3 well placed bolts.
content.protection: Standard rack up to 2 inches plus 3 draws. Parts of the crack will take larger gear but it's not needed. The bolted anchor is set well back from the top of the climb (Metolius over-sized rap bolts).
content.location: First route reached at the top of the gully. On the lower wall - the rest of the routes are on the upper wall and reachable from the top of this climb or a scramble to the right.

content.description: This is a 2nd pitch variation to Seven Seconds.  It is a fun inside corner LFC.
content.protection: gear to 3", bolted rap anchor, rap to station on Loopholes.
content.location: do 1st pitch of 7 seconds, trend left.

content.description: Somewhat nervy 5.7 slab leads up through a tricky but fun sequence at a small roof/block to the first set of anchors.  Great, well-protected slab climbing continues to the top. Great!
content.protection: Gear to 2", seven bolts, bolt anchors above both pitches.  60m rope
content.location: Begins on the low-angle bolted slab a little ways right of the Reclamation corner.  (near some shrubs/small trees)
Bolted face on the far left end of the wall above Pigs in Zen
